entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Granby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Granby 3:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening except freezing rain over southern sections. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy except freezing rain over southern sections early in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
